body:
Comment 6 by **kenliz@cruzio.com**: 
Thank you for your patience in explaining issues to a go "Newbie".

You will be glad to know that there are no "memory corruption" issues involved here.
Once the deferred traces 
were synchronized, all of the output appeared. The blocks of bad output I was observing
represented output 
space that had been allocated, but not filled in.
